effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.platinum: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
flavor_text.platinum: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
